verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Also, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> unto the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; An end <S%H7093><s%>, the end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> upon the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H3671><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

Now is the end <S%H7093><s%> come upon thee, and I will send <S%H7971><s%> mine anger <S%H639><s%> upon thee, and will judge <S%H8199><s%> thee according to thy ways <S%H1870><s%>, and will recompense <S%H5414><s%> upon thee all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%>. recompense: Heb. give

And mine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare <S%H2347><s%> thee, neither will I have pity <S%H2550><s%>: but I will recompense <S%H5414><s%> thy ways <S%H1870><s%> upon thee, and thine abominations <S%H8441><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; An evil <S%H7451><s%>, an only <S%H259><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>, behold, is come <S%H935><s%>.
An end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, the end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>: it watcheth <S%H6974><s%> for thee; behold, it is come <S%H935><s%>. watcheth for: Heb. awaketh against

The morning <S%H6843><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> unto thee, O thou that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>: the time <S%H6256><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> <S%H935><s%>, the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H4103><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%>, and not the sounding again <S%H1906><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>. sounding: or, echo

Now will I shortly <S%H7138><s%> pour out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon thee, and accomplish <S%H3615><s%> mine anger <S%H639><s%> upon thee: and I will judge <S%H8199><s%> thee according to thy ways <S%H1870><s%>, and will recompense <S%H5414><s%> thee for all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

And mine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare <S%H2347><s%>, neither will I have pity <S%H2550><s%>: I will recompense <S%H5414><s%> thee according to thy ways <S%H1870><s%> and thine abominations <S%H8441><s%> that are in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that smiteth <S%H5221><s%>. thee according: Heb. upon thee, etc

Behold the day <S%H3117><s%>, behold, it is come <S%H935><s%>: the morning <S%H6843><s%> is gone forth <S%H3318><s%>; the rod <S%H4294><s%> hath blossomed <S%H6692><s%>, pride <S%H2087><s%> hath budded <S%H6524><s%>.

Violence <S%H2555><s%> is risen up <S%H6965><s%> into a rod <S%H4294><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%>: none of them shall remain, nor of their multitude <S%H1995><s%>, nor of any <S%H1991><s%> of theirs: neither shall there be wailing <S%H5089><s%> for them. theirs: or, their tumultuous persons: Heb. tumult

The time <S%H6256><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, the day <S%H3117><s%> draweth near <S%H5060><s%>: let not the buyer <S%H7069><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, nor the seller <S%H4376><s%> mourn <S%H56><s%>: for wrath <S%H2740><s%> is upon all the multitude <S%H1995><s%> thereof.

For the seller <S%H4376><s%> shall not return <S%H7725><s%> to that which is sold <S%H4465><s%>, although they were yet alive <S%H2416><s%>: for the vision <S%H2377><s%> is touching the whole multitude <S%H1995><s%> thereof, which shall not return <S%H7725><s%>; neither shall any <S%H376><s%> strengthen <S%H2388><s%> himself in the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his life <S%H2416><s%>. although they: Heb. though their life were yet among the living in the: or, whose life is in his iniquity the iniquity: Heb. his iniquity

They have blown <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H8619><s%>, even to make all ready <S%H3559><s%>; but none goeth <S%H1980><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%>: for my wrath <S%H2740><s%> is upon all the multitude <S%H1995><s%> thereof.

The sword <S%H2719><s%> is without <S%H2351><s%>, and the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and the famine <S%H7458><s%> within <S%H1004><s%>: he that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and he that is in the city <S%H5892><s%>, famine <S%H7458><s%> and pestilence <S%H1698><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> him.

But they that escape <S%H6403><s%> of them shall escape <S%H6412><s%>, and shall be on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> like doves <S%H3123><s%> of the valleys <S%H1516><s%>, all of them mourning <S%H1993><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> for his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.
All hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be feeble <S%H7503><s%>, and all knees <S%H1290><s%> shall be weak <S%H3212><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%>. be weak: Heb. go into water

They shall also gird <S%H2296><s%> themselves with sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>, and horror <S%H6427><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> them; and shame <S%H955><s%> shall be upon all faces <S%H6440><s%>, and baldness <S%H7144><s%> upon all their heads <S%H7218><s%>.

They shall cast <S%H7993><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> in the streets <S%H2351><s%>, and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall be removed <S%H5079><s%>: their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall not be able <S%H3201><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the wrath <S%H5678><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: they shall not satisfy <S%H7646><s%> their souls <S%H5315><s%>, neither fill <S%H4390><s%> their bowels <S%H4578><s%>: because it is the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>. removed: Heb. for a separation, or, uncleanness it is: or, their iniquity is their stumblingblock

As for the beauty <S%H6643><s%> of his ornament <S%H5716><s%>, he set <S%H7760><s%> it in majesty <S%H1347><s%>: but they made <S%H6213><s%> the images <S%H6754><s%> of their abominations <S%H8441><s%> and of their detestable things <S%H8251><s%> therein: therefore have I set <S%H5414><s%> it far <S%H5079><s%> from them. set it far: or, made it unto them an unclean thing

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> it into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the strangers <S%H2114><s%> for a prey <S%H957><s%>, and to the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for a spoil <S%H7998><s%>; and they shall pollute <S%H2490><s%> it.

My face <S%H6440><s%> will I turn <S%H5437><s%> also from them, and they shall pollute <S%H2490><s%> my secret <S%H6845><s%> place: for the robbers <S%H6530><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into it, and defile <S%H2490><s%> it. robbers: or, burglers

Make <S%H6213><s%> a chain <S%H7569><s%>: for the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of bloody <S%H1818><s%> crimes <S%H4941><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%>.

Wherefore I will bring <S%H935><s%> the worst <S%H7451><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> their houses <S%H1004><s%>: I will also make the pomp <S%H1347><s%> of the strong <S%H5794><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>; and their holy places <S%H6942><s%> shall be defiled <S%H2490><s%> <S%H5157><s%>. their holy: or, they shall inherit their holy places
Destruction <S%H7089><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>; and they shall seek <S%H1245><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>, and there shall be none. Destruction: Heb. Cutting off

Mischief <S%H1943><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon mischief <S%H1943><s%>, and rumour <S%H8052><s%> shall be upon rumour <S%H8052><s%>; then shall they seek <S%H1245><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%>; but the law <S%H8451><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> from the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and counsel <S%H6098><s%> from the ancients <S%H2205><s%>.

The king <S%H4428><s%> shall mourn <S%H56><s%>, and the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with desolation <S%H8077><s%>, and the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall be troubled <S%H926><s%>: I will do <S%H6213><s%> unto them after their way <S%H1870><s%>, and according to their deserts <S%H4941><s%> will I judge <S%H8199><s%> them; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. according: Heb. with their judgments
